name: Gremlin Garden
description:
Gremlin Garden is a 3D monster trainer and racer with cute and comfy vibes.

You play as Sunny, an aspiring gremlin trainer that wants to win the Gremlin Grand Prix™.

Feed, train and pet your Gremlins to become the very best.
Or lounge around on Gremlin Island. Your choice.

Gremlin Garden is developed by students in the Game Design & Art Collaboration club at UC Santa Cruz.
